name: Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion e no Michi DS
name_original: Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion e no Michi DS
description: Kōchū Ōja Mushiking: Greatest Champion e no Michi DS (roughly translated as Beetle Ruler Mushiking: The Road of the Greatest Champions DS) is a Nintendo DS video game released in 2005 by Family Entertaiment (developer) and Sega (publisher) exclusively in Japan. The game is a updated version of the Game Boy Advance game Kouchuu Ouja Mushi King: Greatest Champion e no Michi.
